Description: This beautiful, fully furnished condo is available from November 1, 2023 - May 31, 2024 on a short term, flexible lease. Located close to the Boston Public Garden, Boston Common, Newbury Street, Prudential Center, local shops and restaurants, this unit provides easy walkable access to everything Back Bay has to offer. The large living area windows allow for natural sunlight throughout the day, the master bedroom with en suite bath overlooks a lovely park located behind the building. Washer and dryer in unit, small dogs are welcome.
